Earn a reward once each day.
Go to Seer's Snare?

You cannot change your team during
the event except when you've started
again by returning to the beginning.
Hero levels will remain at 40. Empty
A, B, and C Skill slots will be filled
with randomly selected skills.

Every slot on your team must be
filled by a Hero.

Duplicate Heroes are not allowed.

You can include only one ally
that can use Sing or Dance
on your team.

You can include only one ally that
can use Savior.
Go to the last sub-boss defeated?

All non-reward progress will be lost.
Consumed stamina will be restored.

Do you want to cancel and exit?
You cannot return once you exit.

You crossed the Timeless Rift
and returned to your own time!

Congratulations on escaping the
Seer's Snare! The event will now
end. You can review your journey
on this screen. If there are any
rewards you have yet to collect,
you can also use Unwind Time
to make another crossing.

Time Traveler seals give units special
advantages. For colorless, the icon on
the left is foes and the right is allies.
Use your skills, defeat your foes!

Seer's Snare:
Make your way across the
Timeless Rift and return to your
own time. Within the Timeless
Rift, fluctuations in time allow
your Heroes to equip lots of
different skills!

Stamina:
・ Moving between locations will
consume 1 stamina.
・ Stamina will be restored only
when you are defeated in a
sub-boss or final-boss area.
(If you already have maximum
stamina, none will be restored.)

Event Details:
The Sacred Seals foes have
equipped cause the effects of
weapon-triangle advantage to be
more pronounced—and colorless
units will have both advantages
and disadvantages. Also, Hero HP
is carried over between maps.

Editing Your Teams:
・Duplicate Heroes aren't allowed.
・Each team can include only one
ally that can use Sing or Dance
and one ally with Savior.
・All Heroes will have a static
level of 40.

Skills:
・ If a Hero does not have an
A, B, C, or S Skill equipped, they
will be equipped with a random
A, B, or C Skill.
・ A, B, C, and S Skills start sealed
and are unlocked via either
rewards or a Vanir Seal.

Expanded Skill Slots:
In addition to the normal set of
skill slots, all Heroes get three
extra levels of A, B, and C Skill
slots. The first level starts
unlocked, and the rest are
unlocked via rewards.

Bonus Heroes:
In addition to expanded skill
slots, Bonus Heroes get HP+10,
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4, and free
S Skill slots that can be equipped
with A, B, or C Skills.

Change Skills:
You can equip skills you've
unlocked to open skill slots.

Unwind Time:
・ Return to Sub-boss: returns
you to just after the last sub-boss
you defeated, as well as the
stamina you've consumed since.
・ Return to Beginning: returns all
your stamina you consumed, and
you keep some Rift Vessels too.

Vanir Seals:
Consume Rift Vessels here to
unlock skills and skill slots.

Safe Havens:
Restore Hero HP here.

More Information:
・ Legendary and Mythic Hero
seasonal effects are deactivated.
・ Neither Duo Skills nor
Harmonized Skills can be used.
・ You do not get EXP or SP.
・ You can obtain Hero Merit.
